commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Add new typing pairs from the text bundle

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Allow markdown parameters to be set via TM_MARKDOWN
commits.body:
For example you may want to set:

    TM_MARKDOWN = "/path/to/multimarkdown --nosmart"

Previously this would fail because TM_MARKDOWN was treated as a single command (with possible spaces in its path).

This mirrors textmate/bundle-support.tmbundle@0a12001c335da1e739a5a6d64368bb781914f50f

commits.author: Christopher Fonnesbeck
commits.summary: Added MathJax support to Markdown preview
commits.body: Disabled by default, to enable support set a 'TM_MARKDOWN_MATHJAX' variable to '1' in preferences.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Revert "Update to support Ruby 1.9 String to Array function"
commits.body:
This broke second level list items, reverting until a solution can be found. Fixes #11.

This reverts commit 1b911bb281afbafbe35c61dfe54ae25f3cccd10a.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Add Format → Raw command bound to <kbd class='keyEquivalent'>⌘K</kbd>
commits.body:
This command handles the following four situations:

 1. No selection, caret on a word: Wraps word in back-ticks (shorthand for <kbd class='keyEquivalent'>⌃W</kbd> + ` + “unselect”).
 2. No selection, caret not on a word: Inserts `‸` (same as pressing back-tick).
 3. Selection not wrapped in back-ticks: Wraps selection (same as pressing back-tick).
 4. Selection wrapped in back-ticks: Strips the back-ticks (same as pressing ]).

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Improve robustness of Increase/Decrease Heading Level
commits.body:
Whitespace after the leading hashes should be optional. Though when we output the version with heading level increased or decreased, we put a space after the hashes.

Fixes #12

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Correct for spaces in image filenames, fixes #4.

commits.author: Nikita Sinenko
commits.summary: Update to support Ruby 1.9 String to Array function

commits.author: Rob McBroom
commits.summary: Add commands for increasing/decreasing heading levels.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Remove MultiMarkdown support in favor of it's own bundle.
